# Menuthere

> Menuthere is the all-in-one digital menu platform for restaurants, cafes, hotels, bakeries, cloud kitchens, food trucks, bars, and catering services. Create a free QR code digital menu in minutes with real-time updates, Google Business Profile sync, dynamic offers, analytics, and online ordering. No app download required for customers. Trusted by 600+ restaurants across India.

## Overview

Menuthere helps food businesses go digital with a smart QR code menu system. Customers scan a QR code and instantly browse the full menu on their phone — no app needed. Restaurant owners get a powerful dashboard to manage menus, orders, offers, analytics, and Google Business sync from one place.

- Website: https://menuthere.com
- Get Started Free: https://menuthere.com/get-started
- Pricing: https://menuthere.com/pricing
- Help Center: https://menuthere.com/help-center
- Download App: https://menuthere.com/download-app
- Book a Demo: https://cal.id/menuthere

## Core Features

### Smart QR Menu
Customers scan a QR code and instantly see the full menu on their phone. No app downloads needed. Beautiful, mobile-first design with high-quality food images, dietary filters, and smart search. Menus load in under 2 seconds. Visual menus increase average order value by up to 25%.

### Google Business Profile Menu Sync
Automatically sync your complete menu — categories, items, prices, and photos — to your Google Business Profile in one click. Restaurants with complete Google profiles get 7x more clicks and drive 30% more footfall. Show up on Google Maps with your full, up-to-date menu.

### Real-Time Menu Updates
Change prices, add items, toggle availability, or run time-based offers instantly from the dashboard. Updates reflect on the digital menu in real time. No reprinting, no designers, no delays. Save thousands annually on printing costs.

### Dynamic Offers and Promotions
Create flash deals, happy-hour specials, or time-based discounts that activate and expire automatically. Highlight best-sellers with Must-Try badges and Chef's Choice tags. Drive repeat visits without printing flyers.

### Analytics and Insights
Track daily scan volumes, peak hour heatmaps, device usage, and best-selling items. Make data-driven decisions about pricing, promotions, and menu placement.

### Google Reviews Booster
Automatically prompt customers to leave a Google review after scanning the menu. Display real-time Google reviews on the digital menu. Build a 5-star rating effortlessly.

### Online Ordering
Accept table orders directly from customers via QR code. Includes KOT (Kitchen Order Ticket) and bill printing, WhatsApp order integration, and POS compatibility.

### Billing System
Fully online and offline billing with remote reports tracking, multi-terminal billing, KOT and bill printing with Bluetooth/USB, and real-time inventory sync.

## Pricing

### Free Trial
$0 for 20 days. Includes unlimited scans, unlimited offers, unlimited edits, and chat support. No credit card required.

### Standard Plan
$9/month or $108/year. Includes 500 scans per month, unlimited offers, unlimited edits, and priority chat support.

### Plus Plan (Most Popular)
$29/month or $348/year. Includes unlimited scans, unlimited offers, unlimited edits, and priority chat support.

### India-Specific Plans
- Digital Menu: Starting at Rs 299/month or Rs 2,999/year
- Online Ordering: Starting at Rs 499/month or Rs 4,999/year (plus 2% transaction fee)
- Billing: Rs 4,999/year

All plans include core features. Cancel anytime. Start free and upgrade as you grow.

## Solutions by Industry

### Restaurants
Smart digital menus for modern restaurants. Replace printed menus with scannable QR codes. Update prices and items instantly.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/restaurants

### Cafes and Coffee Shops
Instagram-worthy menus for specialty brews and pastries. Showcase seasonal drinks and daily specials with real-time updates.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/cafes

### Bakeries and Pastry Shops
Showcase fresh-baked goods with real-time availability. Mark items as sold out instantly when they run out.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/bakeries

### Cloud Kitchens
Manage multiple virtual brands from one dashboard. Separate menus for each brand with unified analytics.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/cloud-kitchens

### Hotels and Resorts
Elegant digital menus for in-room dining and all food and beverage outlets. Multi-location support for hotel chains.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/hotels

### Food Trucks
Mobile menus that update on the fly. Perfect for changing locations and rotating menus.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/food-trucks

### Bars and Pubs
Dark mode designs, tap rotation updates, and happy hour automation. Showcase cocktail menus and daily specials.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/bars

### Catering Services
Professional digital menus for events and weddings. Create custom menus for each event.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/catering

## Solutions by Role

- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/agencies

### Google Business Optimization
Sync menus directly to Google Business Profile. Boost local SEO and drive more foot traffic.
- Learn more: https://menuthere.com/solutions/google-business

- Unlimited menu items and categories
- High-quality food photography display
- Allergen and dietary information labels
- Daily specials and limited-time offers
- Table ordering integration
- Custom branding and themes with color picker
- Multi-location support for restaurant chains
- Nutritional information display
- Multi-language menu support
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Social media sharing
- WhatsApp order integration
- KOT and bill printing via Bluetooth or USB
- Inventory and stock management
- Team roles and permissions
- Staff training and onboarding support

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How do I create a digital menu with Menuthere?
A: Visit https://menuthere.com/get-started, upload a photo of your existing menu, fill in your restaurant details, and your digital menu is created automatically using AI extraction. You can customize themes, colors, and content from the dashboard.

Q: Do my customers need to download an app?
A: No. Customers simply scan the QR code with their phone camera and the menu opens instantly in their browser. No app download required.

Q: How do I update menu prices or items?
A: Log into your dashboard, go to the Menu section, click any item to edit details like name, price, image, or description, then save. Changes go live instantly.

Q: Can I toggle items as out of stock?
A: Yes. In the Menu section, click Availability at the top. Toggle entire categories or individual items on or off with a single click.

Q: How does Google Business sync work?
A: Connect your Google Business Profile from the dashboard. Click sync and your complete menu — categories, items, prices, and photos — is automatically pushed to your Google listing.

Q: Can I run offers and promotions?
A: Yes. Go to the Offers section in your dashboard to create flash deals, happy hour specials, or time-based discounts that activate and expire automatically.

Q: Can I cancel my subscription?
A: Yes. Cancel anytime from your account. Your plan stays active until the current billing period ends.

Q: Is there a free plan?
A: Yes. Start with a free 20-day trial that includes all features. No credit card required.

Q: Does Menuthere support multiple locations?
A: Yes. Multi-location support is available for restaurant chains and hotel groups.
